basic_info.description: Honorably discharged after serving a four year enlistment in the United States Navy. My college education consists of a bachelor's degree from George Mason University in business management and communication. My work experience is in UX/UI Design, Software Development, Startups and Entrepreneurship. Currently a student at Code Fellows studying advanced software development in python and full stack development.

projects.title: Take Ten App
projects.description: Take Ten is an app that we built for our final project in 201. The app allows users to generate a random workout circuit so they have a perfectly formulated workout to execute.

projects.title: Sour Strips
projects.description: Used my UX/UI skills toe redesign the Sour Strips website. Improving overall customer experience and the updated design led to a boost in sales.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: Salmon Cookies was a 201 project as well that we completed. We created a store front for a store owner to sell salmon cookies with the ability to add a new store and track store activity.
